meta.name: The Ember Hollows
meta.description: Volcanic caverns beneath a dwarven city where a young dragon has nested. Descend through lava tubes and collapsed mines to slay the dragon before eruption.

rooms.name: Mine Entrance
rooms.description: Splintered timber frames the mouth of an old dwarven mine shaft, heat rolling outward in waves. Soot-blackened rails run into the darkness, and the stone underfoot trembles with a distant, rhythmic rumble.

rooms.name: Collapsed Tunnel
rooms.description: The ceiling has partially caved in, leaving a narrow passage choked with rubble and dust. Broken mine carts lie on their sides, and the air tastes of copper and ash. Passages branch east and west through gaps in the fallen stone.

npcs.name: Torvald
npcs.title: Stranded Miner
dialogue: the western tunnels run hot with lava — watch your step
dwarven vault's sealed tight down that way, if you can find the path
something massive nests in the deep caves, shakes the whole mountain

rooms.name: West Lava Tube
rooms.description: A natural lava tube stretches ahead, its walls glazed smooth and black like obsidian. Veins of molten rock pulse in the cracks, casting everything in a hellish orange glow. The heat is nearly unbearable.

rooms.name: East Shaft
rooms.description: A vertical mine shaft has been converted into a descending stairway, iron rungs hammered into the rock face. Phosphorescent fungus clings to the walls, and cool air drifts up from below, a welcome relief from the heat above.

rooms.name: Magma Flow
rooms.description: A river of molten rock cuts across the cavern floor, its surface cracking and reforming in slow, mesmerizing patterns. A narrow stone ledge follows the far wall, barely wide enough to traverse single-file. The air shimmers with heat distortion.

rooms.name: Mushroom Grotto
rooms.description: Towering bioluminescent mushrooms fill this cavern with pale blue and violet light. The air is thick with spores that drift like snow, and the ground squelches underfoot. Something has been nesting among the fungal stalks.

rooms.name: Dwarven Vault
rooms.description: Behind a half-melted iron door lies a small chamber lined with stone strongboxes. Most have been fused shut by volcanic heat, but one sits cracked open, its contents glittering in the amber light. Dwarven runes of warding still glow faintly on the walls.

rooms.name: Obsidian Bridge
rooms.description: A slender bridge of solid obsidian arcs over a chasm filled with roiling smoke and the distant glow of magma far below. The bridge is barely three feet wide, its surface razor-sharp at the edges. Wind howls up from the depths.

rooms.name: Crystal Cave
rooms.description: Enormous quartz crystals jut from every surface, refracting the volcanic light into prismatic shards that dance across the walls. The crystals hum with a low resonance that vibrates in the chest. A sulfurous draft blows from the west.

rooms.name: Abandoned Forge
rooms.description: A dwarven forge stands cold and silent, its great bellows collapsed and anvil cracked. Tools hang on the walls in perfect rows, untouched by the chaos elsewhere. A spectral figure works at the anvil, hammer rising and falling without sound.

npcs.name: Brega
npcs.title: Ghost of the Forgemaster
dialogue: the drake fears nothing, but dragonbane steel can wound it deep
my finest blade — take it, finish what we could not
strike together or the beast will pick you off one by one

rooms.name: Sulfur Cavern
rooms.description: Yellow sulfur deposits crust every surface, and acrid fumes sting the eyes and throat. Bubbling fumaroles vent scalding steam at irregular intervals. The convergence of two passages makes this a natural chokepoint before the deeper caves.

rooms.name: Lava Lake
rooms.description: The cavern opens into a vast chamber dominated by a lake of slowly churning magma. Islands of cooled basalt form a precarious path across. The heat is savage, and the orange light paints everything in shades of fire and blood.

rooms.name: Dragon's Antechamber
rooms.description: Scorched bones of dwarves and beasts alike litter the ground in grotesque piles. The walls are gouged with claw marks the size of a man's arm. A hot wind gusts from the north, carrying the unmistakable stench of dragon.

rooms.name: Dragon's Nest
rooms.description: A colossal cavern glowing with rivers of lava that feed a central caldera. Atop a mound of melted gold and charred stone, the Magma Drake Pyraxis coils — scales like cooling magma, eyes like twin furnaces. The ground shudders with each breath it draws.
